issue.title: [Crossbow] Windows builds are attempting to run linux and osx packaging tasks
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-2931](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2931). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Not a blocker for 0.10.0, but this makes the `status` subcommand of `crossbow.py` report spurious failures.
